doc:
Jennifer Rubin (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jennifer_Rubin_(actress) 0 Jennifer Collene Rubin (born April 3, 1962) is an American actress and former model. A competitive swimmer during her youth, Rubin was discovered by the Ford Modeling Agency and went on to model for Calvin Klein and became Ford International Model of the Year in 1984. She made her film debut as Taryn White in the 1987 horror film A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors and has since starred in a variety of films including Andrew Fleming's Bad Dreams (1988), Marisa Silver's Permanent Record (1988), Oliver Stone's The Doors (1991), Alan Shapiro's The Crush (1993), Louis Venosta's The Coriolis Effect (1994), Christian Duguay's Screamers (1995), and the 2001 Dogme 95 inspired film Reunion. Outside of film, Rubin has guest starred on a variety of television series such as The Twilight Zone (1987) and Tales from the Crypt (1992). In 2010, Rubin appeared as herself in the documentary Never Sleep Again: The Elm Street Legacy. Jennifer_Collene_Rubin ( born April_3_,_1962 ) is an_American_actress and former_model . A_competitive_swimmer during her_youth , Rubin was_discovered by the_Ford_Modeling_Agency and went on to_model for Calvin_Klein and became Ford_International_Model of the_Year in 1984 . She made her_film_debut as Taryn_White in the_1987_horror_film_A_Nightmare on Elm_Street_3 : Dream_Warriors and has_since_starred in a_variety of films including Andrew_Fleming 's_Bad_Dreams_(_1988_) , Marisa_Silver 's_Permanent_Record_(_1988_) , Oliver_Stone 's_The_Doors_(_1991_) , Alan_Shapiro 's_The_Crush_(_1993_) , Louis_Venosta 's_The_Coriolis_Effect_(_1994_) , Christian_Duguay 's_Screamers_(_1995_) , and the_2001_Dogme_95 inspired film_Reunion . Outside of film , Rubin has guest starred on a_variety of television_series such_as The_Twilight_Zone_(_1987_)_and_Tales from the_Crypt_(_1992_) . In 2010 , Rubin appeared as herself in the_documentary Never Sleep_Again : The_Elm_Street_Legacy .
